column2:
"If you're an excellent rod user,
then you'll have simply swept
everything away so far."

"But there are not many who have
thoroughly understood what magic is."

"Kill Dargon X to take your first step
towards the heights I want you to
reach."

"単に優秀なロッド使いなら
これまで掃いて捨てるほどいた。"

"だが法撃の何たるかを極めた者は
それほど多くない。"

"ドラゴン・エクスを仕留めることで
また一歩、高みに登ってほしい。"
